blocking_issues.description: correctness issues identified by the council's top-ranked review (Response C). Specifically, the `BlockAssembler` initialization is fragile and will crash with a `KeyError` if partial budgets are provided. Furthermore, the token budget enforcement is structurally flawed: it fails to account for the XML tag overhead added in `to_prompt` (violating strict constraints) and inconsistent per-block budget enforcement allows high-priority blocks to starve others contrary to the documented architecture."
